sect1.title: escape
sect1.para: escape is used to encode or escape a variable to html, url, single quotes, hex, hexentity, javascript and mail. By default its html.

row.entry: html, htmlall, url, urlpathinfo, quotes, hex, hexentity, javascript, mail
This is the escape format to use.

ISO-8859-1, UTF-8, and any character set supported by
htmlentities()
The character set encoding passed to htmlentities() et. al.
Double encode entites from & to &amp; (applys to html and htmlall only)
